org.vast.ows

Interface OWSRequestWriter<RequestType extends OWSRequest>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestWriter, CancelRequestWriterV20, ConfirmRequestWriterV20, DescribeCoverageWriterV11, DescribeProcessRequestWriter, DescribeProcessWriter, DescribeResultAccessRequestWriterV20, DescribeSensorWriterV20, DescribeTaskingRequestWriterV20, ExecuteProcessRequestWriter, GetCapabilitiesWriter, GetCoverageWriterV11, GetFeasibilityRequestWriterV20, GetFoiWriterV20, GetMapWriterV10, GetMapWriterV11, GetObservationWriterV20, GetResultTemplateWriterV20, GetResultWriterV20, GetStatusRequestWriterV20, InsertObservationWriterV20, InsertResultTemplateWriterV20, InsertResultWriterV20, InsertSensorWriterV20, RegisterWriterV10, ReserveRequestWriterV20, SASGetCapabilitiesWriter, SASSubscribeWriter, SubmitRequestWriterV20, SWERequestWriter, TaskingRequestWriterV20, UnregisterWriterV10, UpdateRequestWriterV20, WCSTransactionWriterV11, WRSRequestWriter

    public interface OWSRequestWriter<RequestType extends OWSRequest>

    Base interface for all OWS request writers

    Since:
    Jan 16, 2007 * @param Type of request object supported by this writer
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String buildURLQuery(RequestType request)
      Builds a String containing the GET request URL
      Element buildXMLQuery(DOMHelper dom, RequestType request)
      Builds a DOM element containing the request XML Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.

                     throws OWSException
        Builds a String containing the GET request URL

        Returns:
        qury string generated from the content of the request object

      • buildXMLQuery

        Element buildXMLQuery(DOMHelper dom,
                    RequestType request)
                      throws OWSException
        Builds a DOM element containing the request XML Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.
        Parameters:
        dom - DOMHelper instance that will own the generated element
        request - OWs request object
        Returns:
        DOM element containing the XML representation of the request
        Throws:
        OWSException
